description.en:
BUMO is a next-generation commercial-grade public Blockchain for ubiquitous and trusted value transfer, which is aimed to build a decentralized application ecosystem featured with extensive digital trust, free-flowing value and public-sharing apps.

As the next-generation, commercially viable, underlying public Blockchain, BUMO will build Ubiquitous Trust Network for value circulation. We present you a distributed ecosystem of business, which is featured by extensive digital trust, freely transferred assets and public-sharing applications.

Technical advantages:

(1) Innovative consensus algorithm for two-layer multiple chains.

(2) Two-layer Polymorphic Architecture for Multi-child Blockchain.

(3) Inter-Chain for Routing Value across Blockchains.

(4) Developer-friendly Smart Contract.

BUMO is a basic public Blockchain for institution/enterprise use which is technically mature. Its main net was published in May, 2018.
